post.body: So are you not staying over at the 'rents.
Merry Christmas to you as well. Love ya!!
Happy Birthday!
Step-brothers
And another Christmas Eve comes to an end.
Watching some Family Guy with my nephew. - Photo: http://bkite.com/03cYb

Merry Christmas Eve:
